A file with this name already exists. Do.A file with this name already exists. Do: 檔案名稱已存在。是否要覆蓋它？

Alt+←/Backspace: Back • F1/I: File Info.Alt+←/Backspace: Back • F1/I: File Info: Alt+←/Backspace: 返回 • F1/I: 檔案資訊 • F10: 幫助 • Esc: 關閉

Always show a minimum of 3 workspaces, e.Always show a minimum of 3 workspaces, e: 始終顯示至少 3 個工作區，即使可用的工作區較少

Apply warm color temperature to reduce e.Apply warm color temperature to reduce e: 應用暖色溫以減輕眼睛疲勞。使用下方的自動化設定來控制其啟動時間。

Apps are ordered by usage frequency, the.Apps are ordered by usage frequency, the: 應用程式按使用頻率、最後使用時間、字母順序排列。

Are you sure you want to hibernate the s.Are you sure you want to hibernate the s: 你確定要進入系統休眠嗎?

Automatically calculate popup distance f.Automatically calculate popup distance f: 自動計算彈出框與資訊欄的距離。

Automatically cycle through wallpapers i.Automatically cycle through wallpapers i: 自動輪替更換同一資料夾中的桌布

Automatically detect location based on I.Automatically detect location based on I: 根據IP位址自動偵測位置

Automatically determine your location us.Automatically determine your location us: 使用您的 IP 位址自動確定您的位置

Automatically extract colors from wallpa.Automatically extract colors from wallpa: 自動從桌布中提取顏色

Automatically hide the top bar to expand.Automatically hide the top bar to expand: 自動隱藏頂部欄以擴大螢幕空間

Automatically lock the screen when the s.Automatically lock the screen when the s: 系統暫停時自動鎖定螢幕

Balanced palette with focused accents (d.Balanced palette with focused accents (d: 顏色平衡且帶有重點點綴的調色板 (預設)。

Bind lock screen to dbus signals from lo.Bind lock screen to dbus signals from lo: 將鎖定畫面綁定到 loginctl 的 dbus 訊號。如果使用外部鎖屏，請停用

Blur wallpaper when niri overview is ope.Blur wallpaper when niri overview is ope: 當 niri 概覽打開時模糊桌布

Bottom dock for pinned and running appli.Bottom dock for pinned and running appli: 底部 Dock 用於固定和正在運行的應用程式

Choose Launcher Logo Color.Choose Launcher Logo Color: 選擇啟動器 Logo 顏色

Choose the logo displayed on the launche.Choose the logo displayed on the launche: 選擇 DankBar 啟動器按鈕上顯示的 logo

Choose where notification popups appear.Choose where notification popups appear: 選擇通知彈出視窗在螢幕上出現的位置

Colorful mix of bright contrasting accen.Colorful mix of bright contrasting accen: 明亮對比點綴的繽紛組合。

Command or script to run instead of the.Command or script to run instead of the: 代替標準休眠的指令或腳本

Configure icons for named workspaces. Ic.Configure icons for named workspaces. Ic: 為命名工作區配置圖示。當同時啟用圖示和數字時，圖示優先於數字。

Configure which displays show shell comp.Configure which displays show shell comp: 配置哪些顯示器顯示 shell 元件

Controls opacity of all popouts, modals,.Controls opacity of all popouts, modals,: 控制所有彈出式介面、模態對話框及其內容層級的不透明度 (適用於 DankDash、設定、應用程式抽屜、控制中心等)

Controls opacity of individual widgets i.Controls opacity of individual widgets i: 控制 DankBar 內部各別部件的不透明度

Controls opacity of the DankBar panel ba.Controls opacity of the DankBar panel ba: 控制 DankBar 面板背景的不透明度

Derives colors that closely match the un.Derives colors that closely match the un: 提取與底層圖像高度匹配的顏色。

Display a dock with pinned and running a.Display a dock with pinned and running a: 顯示一個帶有固定和正在運行的應用程式的 Dock，這些應用程式可以放置在螢幕的頂部、底部、左側或右側邊緣

Display all priorities over fullscreen a.Display all priorities over fullscreen a: 顯示全螢幕應用程式上的所有優先級

Display application icons in workspace i.Display application icons in workspace i: 在工作區標籤中顯示應用程式圖標

Display currently focused application ti.Display currently focused application ti: 顯示目前焦點應用程式的標題

Display volume and brightness percentage.Display volume and brightness percentage: 在 OSD 彈出視窗中預設顯示音量和亮度百分比值

Displays the active keyboard layout and.Displays the active keyboard layout and: 顯示目前鍵盤布局且允許切換

Diverse palette spanning the full spectr.Diverse palette spanning the full spectr: 涵蓋整個光譜的多元調色板。

Enable compositor-targetable blur layer.Enable compositor-targetable blur layer: 啟用合成器可定位的模糊圖層（命名空間：dms:blurwallpaper）。需要手動配置 niri。

Enable loginctl lock integration.Enable loginctl lock integration: 啟用 loginctl 鎖定整合

Last launched %1 hour%2 ago.Last launched %1 hour%2 ago: 上次啟動於 %1 小時前

Network download and upload speed displa.Network download and upload speed displa: 顯示網路下載跟上傳速度

No VPN profiles found.No VPN profiles found: 未找到 VPN 設定檔

Place plugin directories here. Each plug.Place plugin directories here. Each plug: 將插件資料夾放在這裡。每個插件都應該有一個 plugin.json 清單檔案。

Play sound when new notification arrives.Play sound when new notification arrives: 收到新通知時播放音效

Plugin is disabled - enable in Plugins s.Plugin is disabled - enable in Plugins s: 插件已停用 - 在插件設定中啟用即可使用

Quick access to application launcher.Quick access to application launcher: 快速存取應用程式啟動器

Scale DankBar font sizes independently.Scale DankBar font sizes independently: 獨立縮放 DankBar 字體大小

Select the palette algorithm used for wa.Select the palette algorithm used for wa: 請選擇調色板演算法，以桌布的顏色為基底。

Select which transitions to include in r.Select which transitions to include in r: 選擇要包含在隨機中的轉換效果

Set different wallpapers for each connec.Set different wallpapers for each connec: 為每個連接的螢幕設定不同的桌布

Set different wallpapers for light and d.Set different wallpapers for light and d: 為淺色/深色主題設定不同的桌布

Shift+Del: Clear All • Esc: Close.Shift+Del: Clear All • Esc: Close: Shift+Del: 清除所有 • Esc: 關閉

Show all 9 tags instead of only occupied.Show all 9 tags instead of only occupied: 顯示所有 9 個標籤，而非僅顯示已佔用的標籤 (僅限 DWL)

Show darkened overlay behind modal dialo.Show darkened overlay behind modal dialo: 在模態對話框後顯示暗化覆蓋層

Show on all connected displays.Show on all connected displays: 在所有連接的螢幕上顯示

Show only apps running in current worksp.Show only apps running in current worksp: 僅顯示目前工作區中正在執行的應用程式

Show only workspaces belonging to each s.Show only workspaces belonging to each s: 僅顯示屬於每個特定監視器的工作區。

Show power, restart, and logout buttons.Show power, restart, and logout buttons: 在鎖定畫面上顯示電源、重新啟動和登出按鈕

Show weather information in top bar and.Show weather information in top bar and: 在頂部欄和控制中心顯示天氣資訊

Show workspace index numbers in the top.Show workspace index numbers in the top: 在頂部欄工作區切換器中顯示工作區編號

Shows all running applications with focu.Shows all running applications with focu: 顯示所有正在運行的應用程式並帶有焦點指示

Shows current workspace and allows switc.Shows current workspace and allows switc: 顯示目前工作區並允許切換

Shows when microphone, camera, or screen.Shows when microphone, camera, or screen: 顯示麥克風、攝影機或螢幕共用處於活動狀態

Sync Mode with Portal.Sync Mode with Portal: 透過 Portal 同步主題模式

System bar with widgets and system infor.System bar with widgets and system infor: 帶有部件和系統資訊的系統欄

System notification area icons.System notification area icons: 顯示常駐程式狀態圖示和系統通知

The DMS_SOCKET environment variable is n.The DMS_SOCKET environment variable is n: DMS_SOCKET 環境變數未設定或套接字不可用。自動插件管理需要 DMS_SOCKET。

The below settings will modify your GTK.The below settings will modify your GTK: 以下設定將修改您的 GTK 和 Qt 設定。如果您希望保留目前配置，請備份 (qt5ct.conf|qt6ct.conf 和 ~/.config/gtk-3.0|gtk-4.0)。

Third-party plugins are created by the c.Third-party plugins are created by the c: 第三方插件由社群創建，不受 DankMaterialShell 官方支援。\n\n這些插件可能會帶來安全性和隱私風險 - 安裝後風險自負。

This widget prevents GPU power off state.This widget prevents GPU power off state: 此部件可防止 GPU 電源關閉，這會嚴重影響筆記型電腦的電池續航時間。不建議在配備混合顯示卡的筆記型電腦上使用此功能。

This will permanently delete all clipboa.This will permanently delete all clipboa: 這將永久刪除所有剪貼簿歷史記錄。

To update, run the following command:.To update, run the following command:: 若要更新，請執行以下命令：

Toggle top bar visibility manually (can.Toggle top bar visibility manually (can: 手動切換頂部欄可見性 (可透過 IPC 控制)

Use 24-hour time format instead of 12-ho.Use 24-hour time format instead of 12-ho: 使用 24 小時時間格式，而不是 12 小時 AM/PM

Use Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for te.Use Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for te: 使用華氏度代替攝氏度來表示溫度

Use animated wave progress bars for medi.Use animated wave progress bars for medi: 在媒體播放使用動畫波浪進度條

Use custom command for update your syste.Use custom command for update your syste: 使用自訂指令更新您的系統

Use fingerprint reader for lock screen a.Use fingerprint reader for lock screen a: 使用指紋辨識器進行鎖定畫面身份驗證（需要註冊指紋）

Use light theme instead of dark theme.Use light theme instead of dark theme: 使用淺色主題而不是深色主題

Use sound theme from system settings.Use sound theme from system settings: 使用系統設定中的音效主題

Uses sunrise/sunset times to automatical.Uses sunrise/sunset times to automatical: 使用根據您的位置日出/日落時間自動調整夜間模式。

色彩鮮明且飽和度活潑的調色板。

Visual divider between widgets.Visual divider between widgets: 部件之間的視覺分隔符

Visual effect used when wallpaper change.Visual effect used when wallpaper change: 桌布變更時所使用的視覺效果

When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetic.When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetic: 啟用後，應用程式將按字母順序排序。禁用後，應用程式將按使用頻率排序。
